## Configuration in MegaLinter

| Variable                   | Description                   | Default value |
|----------------------------|-------------------------------|---------------|
| BICEP_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |               |
| BICEP_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |               |
